exe1.title: Reverse String
exe1.description:
Write a program which reverses a string and print it on the console.
Examples:
input: String output: gnirtS
input: Git output: tiG

exe2.title: Smallest of Three Numbers
exe2.description:
Write a method to print the smallest of three integer numbers. Examples: input: 3 8 24 output: 3
input: 44 95 29 output: 29

exe3.title: NxN Matrix
exe3.description:
Write a method that receives a single integer n and prints nxn matrix with that number. Examples: input: 3 output: 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3
input: 2 output: 2 2 2 2
